case.notes: Network of shell companies that received contracts from IMSS for medical supplies, pharmaceuticals, and services. Many companies shared addresses, legal representatives, or were created shortly before receiving contracts. ASF identified pattern of subcontracting to non-existent entities.

institutions.notes: Primary awarding institution - largest health procurement budget
State delegation with high irregularity rate
State delegation flagged for vendor concentration
